history.proof: intros. unfold Reflexive. left. apply InitialRing.R_setoid3_Reflexive. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
R2: rel A A
R1: rel A A

Goal:
Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive (R1 \/ R2)

Premises:
Reflexive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x : A, R x x : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments Reflexive {A}%type_scope _%rel_scope
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
prod_rel_refl : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R3 -> Reflexive R4 -> Reflexive (R3 * R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
sum_rel_refl : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R3 -> Reflexive R4 -> Reflexive (R3 + R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y \/ R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_union {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
set_le_refl : forall R : relation ?A, Reflexive R -> Reflexive (set_le R) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
set_ge_refl : forall R : relation ?A, Reflexive R -> Reflexive (set_ge R) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
arrow_refl : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B), Coreflexive RA -> Reflexive RB -> Reflexive (RA ++> RB) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) => forall (x : A) (y : B), R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel (rel A B) (rel A B) Arguments subrel {A B}%type_scope (R1 R2)%rel_scope : rename
eq_subrel : forall R : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R -> Related eq R subrel where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
reflexivity_rstep : forall (R : rel ?A ?A) (x : ?A), Reflexive R -> RStep True (R x x) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_refl = fun (T A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Reflexive R) (x : T -> A) (a : T) => (fun H0 : R (x a) (x a) => H0) (H (x a)) : forall (T A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (- ==> R) Arguments arrow_pointwise_refl {T A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
Ring_theory.C_setoid_Reflexive : forall (C : Type) (ceq : C -> C -> Prop), Equivalence ceq -> Reflexive ceq
InitialRing.R_set1_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_setoid3_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_setoid4_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
InitialRing.R_setoid5_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
Field_theory.R_setoid3_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> Reflexive req
list_rel_refl = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (HR : Reflexive R) (l : list A) => list_ind (fun l0 : list A => list_rel R l0 l0) (nil_rel_def R) (fun (a : A) (l0 : list A) (IHl : list_rel R l0 l0) => cons_rel_def R a a (HR a) l0 l0 IHl) l : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (list_rel R) Arguments list_rel_refl {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
ssrsetoid.compat_Reflexive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (H : Reflexive R) => H : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> ssrclasses.Reflexive R Arguments ssrsetoid.compat_Reflexive {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
Setoid.Build_Setoid_Theory : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Symmetric R -> Transitive R -> Equivalence R
rel_union_subrel_rexists_r : forall R R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R R4) subrel R (R3 \/ R4)%rel where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union_subrel_rexists_l : forall R R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R R3) subrel R (R3 \/ R4)%rel where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union_lub : forall R3 R4 R : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R3 R /\ subrel R4 R) subrel (R3 \/ R4)%rel R where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union_rexists_r : forall (R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B) (x : ?A) (y : ?B), RExists (R4 x y) (R3 \/ R4) x y where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union_rexists_l : forall (R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B) (x : ?A) (y : ?B), RExists (R3 x y) (R3 \/ R4) x y where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
option_rel_refl = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (HR : Reflexive R) (x0 : option A) => match x0 as o return (option_rel R o o) with | Some x => Some_rel_def R x x (reflexivity x) | None => None_rel_def R end : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (option_rel R) Arguments option_rel_refl {A}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope
set_le_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (HR : subrel R1 R2) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) (Hs : set_le R1 sA sB) (x : A) (Hx : sA x) => let e : exists b : B, sB b /\ R1 x b := Hs x Hx in match e with | ex_intro _ y (conj Hy Hxy) => ex_intro (fun b : B => sB b /\ R2 x b) y (conj Hy (HR x y Hxy)) end : forall A B : Type, Monotonic set_le (subrel ++> subrel) Arguments set_le_subrel {A B}%type_scope
forall_rel : (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), ?E v1 v2 -> rel (?FV1 v1) (?FV2 v2)) -> rel (forall v1 : ?V1, ?FV1 v1) (forall v2 : ?V2, ?FV2 v2) where ?V1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?E : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V2 -> Type]
BinNat.N.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
BinPos.Pos.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
BinNat.N.divide_reflexive = BinNat.N.divide_refl : Reflexive BinNat.N.divide
BinInt.Z.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
PeanoNat.Nat.divide_reflexive = PeanoNat.Nat.divide_refl : Reflexive PeanoNat.Nat.divide
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_refl = Equivalence_Reflexive : Reflexive eq
BinInt.Z.divide_reflexive = BinInt.Z.divide_refl : Reflexive BinInt.Z.divide
forall_pointwise_rel : (forall v : ?V, rel (?FV1 v) (?FV2 v)) -> rel (forall v : ?V, ?FV1 v) (forall v : ?V, ?FV2 v) where ?V : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V -> Type]
rexists : (PolarityResolved ?R -> ?R ?m ?n) -> ?R ?m ?n where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?R : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?A ?B] ?m : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?A] ?n : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?B]
rdestruct : forall (m : ?Goal0 * ?Goal1) (n : ?Goal2 * ?Goal3), (?RA * ?RB)%rel m n ->...-> P m n where ?Goal0 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?Goal1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?Goal2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?Goal3 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?RA : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?Goal0 ?Goal2] ?RB : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?Goal1 ?Goal3]
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
OrderedRing.sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Reflexive req
ZCoeff.sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Reflexive req

intros.
unfold Reflexive.
intros H1 x.
left.
